mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_INTERVIEW(I_ID, I_RCID, I_RSID, I_TIME, I_ADDRESS, I_EMPID, I_STATE, I_UID) VALUES (T_INTERVIEW_SEQ.nextval,#{recruit.id},#{resume.id},#{time},#{address},#{employee.id},#{state},#{users.id})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_INTERVIEW SET I_STATE=#{state} where I_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_INTERVIEW i,T_RECRUIT rc,T_RESUME rs,T_EMPLOYEE emp,T_DEPARTMENT dep,T_POSITION pos WHERE i.I_RCID=rc.RC_ID AND i.I_RSID=rs.RS_ID AND i.I_EMPID=emp.EMP_ID AND rc.RC_DEPID=dep.DEP_ID AND rc.RC_POSID=pos.POS_ID AND i.I_UID=#{id}
